title: Heidi Klum, 46, files to legally change her name to Heidi Kaulitz
text:
Heidi Klum has made the first legal step to get her name officially changed to Heidi Kaulitz after tying the knot with her 30-year-old husband Tom Kaulitz this summer.

The Blast reported on Thursday that legal documents reflect Heidi's request to legally change her name.

The 46-year-old cited 'marriage' as the reason for her decision.

Wedded bliss: Heidi Klum has made the first legal step to get her name officially changed to Heidi Kaulitz to coincide with her husband Tom Kaulitz's name; here they are seen in late September in LA

Heidi and Tom Kaulitz walked down the aisle in early August after filing a marriage license at the LA courthouse in private.

The supermodel and Tokio Hotel musician were first seen in public together at Cannes in 2018.

She got flak for dating a man 17 years younger than her at the time.

'Lately, I’m being reminded more about my age by people other than myself,' Heidi told InStyle.

She continued: 'My boyfriend is many years younger than me, and lots of people are questioning that and asking about it.'

'That's really the only time when age seems to be shoved in my face and I have to give an answer for it. I don't really think about it that much otherwise.

Flashing that ring: Heidi and Tom Kaulitz walked down the aisle in early August after filing a marriage license at the LA courthouse in private

'You have to just live a happy life without worrying too much about what people think because worrying is only going to give you more wrinkles.'

And she told People this week that she feels Tom is a great match for her: 'He enjoys life and is very generous. He’s super kind. I just found my partner finally, you know?'

The model also said that they will be doing a couples costume for Halloween this year. 'He’s really game for anything. We’re very similar that way.'

Heidi was previously wed to British musician Seal from 2005 to 2014, and actor Ric Pipino from 1997 to 2002.

She shares Helene, 15, Henry, 14, Lou, nine, and Johan, 12, with Seal.
description: Heidi Klum has made the first legal step to get her name officially changed to Heidi Kaulitz to coincide with her husband Tom Kaulitz's name.
